Address: 510 1ST AVENUE NORTH SUITE 305, MINNEAPOLIS, Minnesota, 55403, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Qumu Corporation ("Qumu" or the "Company") provides the software solutions to create, manage, secure, distribute and measure the success of live and on-demand video for enterprises. The Qumu platform enables global organizations to drive employee engagement, increase access to video, and modernize the workplace by providing a more efficient and effective way to share knowledge. The world's largest organizations leverage the Qumu platform for a variety of cloud, on-premise and hybrid deployments. Use cases including self-service webcasting, sales enablement, internal communications, product training, regulatory compliance and customer engagement. The Company and its channel partners market Qumu's products to customers primarily in North America, Europe and Asia. The Company generates revenue through the sale of enterprise video content management software, hardware, maintenance and support, and professional and other services.  ... More ...
